body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CarCraze Customer Support. My name is Zachary Alexander. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, Zachary. My name is Kimberly Wright.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Kimberly. Can you confirm your email address and phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email is k.wright@example.com and my phone number is seven two two - eight five six - nine zero zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Kimberly. One last question, can you specify the model of the vehicle you're inquiring about and the issue you're facing with its product quality?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm inquiring about the Ford Explorer and I'm experiencing interior fabric tearing issues.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Kimberly. I will escalate this matter to our tech team. Is there anything else you'd like to address today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, I appreciate your assistance, Zachary.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Kimberly. Thank you for your time and have a wonderful day!
